biotools.summary: Establishes an interface between R and Cytoscape by using different Java-R libraries, e.g. Rserve, RCaller. It can be used as a plug-in, e.g. to run R commands or to be used as a library to allow your plug-in to connect to R.

bioschemas.name: Cyrface
bioschemas.summary: Establishes an interface between R and Cytoscape by using different Java-R libraries, e.g. Rserve, RCaller. It can be used as a plug-in, e.g. to run R commands or to be used as a library to allow your plug-in to connect to R.
